author: Holmes Lybrand, Hannah Rabinowitz and Casey Gannon, CNN
title: Judge warns of US divisions and cites Russia's attack on Ukraine while sentencing Capitol riot defendant
description: The man photographed carrying House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's lectern during the January 6 riot was sentenced to 75 days in jail Friday after the judge warned about political divisions in the US, pointing to Russia's invasion of Ukraine as a cautionary example.
